creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: A-frame cottage at R next to winding river at center; high bank to L of river with a tree; heavy foliage behind cottage
marks:
Title, Label

-- titled in plate, center of bott
provenance: [William Weston Gallery, London, sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Colinet: Unhappy Hour
